head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CORDERO, MARJORIE D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CORDERO, MARJORIE D.

block.p: CORDERO-Marjorie D., of Greenvale, NY suddenly on January 22, 2001. Beloved wife of Angel. Loving mother of Julie, Canela and Angel. Cherished daughter of Irene and the late Dr. Samuel Clayton. Dear sister of Samuel, George, Barbara and Christine. Funeral Mass Friday 11:00 am, St. Hyacinth Church, Glen Head, NY. Interment Locust Valley Cemetery, Locust Valley, NY. In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to The Thoroughbred Horse Retirement Foundation. For information Whitting Funeral Home, Glen Head.

In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to The Thoroughbred Horse Retirement Foundation. For information Whitting Funeral Home, Glen Head.
